attributes.action: Make it illegal for practising homosexuals to use public swimming baths.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Practising homosexuals suffer damage to their anus which can allow leakage from their rectum.  They should therefore be banned from using public swimming baths or at least made to wear some form of 'nappy, to protect the health and well-being of other swimmers.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
